description:
The year is ending, but not without one last free Porto JavaScript Community meetup supported by the ScaleUp Porto initiative. 
André Cruz (https://twitter.com/satazor), Founder & CTO at MOXY, André Garzia (https://twitter.com/soapdog), Tech Speaker at Mozilla, and Alex Potsides (https://twitter.com/achingbrain), Core JavaScript Developer at Protocol Labs, are the speakers for this event.
name: OPO.js Meetup #8
